article.title: Welcome to the Wisconsin U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the Wisconsin U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​The U.S. Commercial Service of the U.S. Department of Commerce is a federal government agency dedicated to helping small-to-medium sized companies develop international markets.

Our experienced staff of International Trade Specialists will help you:

  • Identify and Evaluate International Partners
  • Navigate International Documentation Challenges
  • Create Market Entry Strategies
  • Other Export Related Guidance

The U.S. Export Assistance Center is part of an international network of global professionals. We have 165 offices in 82 countries throughout the world.

For more information on how we can help your company succeed in the global marketplace, please learn more about Our Services.

Export Compliance Training Seminar

Date: June 10, 2014

Venue: BMO Institute for Learning
395 North Executive Drive
Brookfield, WI 53005

Cost: $295 per registrant(registration is non-refundable)

Deadline: June 2, 2014

To Register: click here​
